Text: What does the Mark look like? Cause I've got this weird looking birthday mark on my arm......???

The beast is the NWO of the future... brought to us by the PNAC who already has in play the implanting of ID chips and commercials telling us "it's for our safety".

They are already in the new passports that we now have to use.

They are still working on tying our finances into the chip so we wont (and can't)  use currency anymore.
... and they will also transmit a tracking signal.
